display_long_description:
Welcome to Newton's Playground where your imagination is the limit! 
Build a bathtub car, a custom weapon that defies the laws of physics, or just enjoy some silly sandbox fun

# Drivable Vehicles
Get ready to race, jump, and stunt your way through fully drivable vehicles, bringing a new level of fun and chaos to the game.
[media]
# Build 
Build a bathtub car, a bathtub flying machine, or even a rocket – the possibilities are endless

[media]

# Physics
Get ready to have fun with physics and let your creativity run wild in the Sandbox. 

[media]

# Utility Guns
Sandbox mode offers variety of utility guns that allow you to manipulate the game's objects and environment in new and exciting ways. You can also scale objects up or down, creating giant versions of everyday objects or shrinking them to the size of your palm.

[media]

 
Explore a wide variety of objects and experiment with their physics in the sandbox mode.

[media]

# Scale NPCs 

[media]

Welcome to Newton's Playground where your imagination is the limit! 
Build a bathtub car, a custom weapon that defies the laws of physics, or just enjoy some silly sandbox fun

# Drivable Vehicles
Get ready to race, jump, and stunt your way through fully drivable vehicles, bringing a new level of fun and chaos to the game.

# Build 
Build a bathtub car, a bathtub flying machine, or even a rocket – the possibilities are endless

![{"height":548,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974891_287640401074327_8862312040475806466_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=25dgkfSqXAkQ7kNvwHbirKs&_nc_oc=AdlEIo04PummBbanoXu4F2X0Yr0VitFxz_9vL8B8e395EBhAXRkBfiG3XC1rOwoW9jk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=rVUc0qxVUdxPjA5n2ZHrsw&oh=00_AfLb-1SJjMNjYpMCelxqj9hjqid69kGUUVE42VuUFooy0Q&oe=68397BEB)

# Physics
Get ready to have fun with physics and let your creativity run wild in the Sandbox. 

![{"height":548,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39035327_443482398670010_9131985149435355845_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=7zWkYTLscDsQ7kNvwH_qgpK&_nc_oc=AdkYexgkGzLArjoMBZfBrrtnapyhi0OhRDMWx5IP995-dERs_PO5l-InGD6ZXC0Szos&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=rVUc0qxVUdxPjA5n2ZHrsw&oh=00_AfLxYcXqW65chI-e-nNkhjEw7dMgTgoVE-lNQZCyNW3mpA&oe=68395D0D)

# Utility Guns
Sandbox mode offers variety of utility guns that allow you to manipulate the game's objects and environment in new and exciting ways. You can also scale objects up or down, creating giant versions of everyday objects or shrinking them to the size of your palm.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974688_1645322686252760_8480780843290036089_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=rTbr_lQKgt4Q7kNvwFT0Dsi&_nc_oc=Adn05bvsEhx9kPqbz9XS0IbIWEzdaxOHqTPDmn6jH_pErZ1lpBg2ATMVpRlEZbuTW1A&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=rVUc0qxVUdxPjA5n2ZHrsw&oh=00_AfKlL7lpKd68wK_s9O6zZ-Cl8czEFoO3il-CpHCnCh8yHw&oe=6839826B)

 
Explore a wide variety of objects and experiment with their physics in the sandbox mode.
